forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 79. Southeast wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely after 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. Southeast wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 74. East southeast wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. East southeast wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
